StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DeleteCandidateCriteriaCon.rma.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int, @ProgramAvailabilityID int = NULL, @QSN char(9) = NULL AS
--- DELETE THE CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION RECORD DELETE FROM CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID AND --- DELETE THE CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION RECORD FOR THE PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY ID ((@ProgramAvailabilityID IS NOT NULL AND PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID = @ProgramAvailabilityID) OR --- DELETE THE CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION RECORD FOR THE QSN (@QSN IS NOT NULL AND QSN = @QSN))
